cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("grok")

	GROK("src",
		"%{ONE}",
	).PATTERN_DEFINITIONS(
		map[string]string{
			"ONE": ".5",
		},
	)

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: grok
processors:
  - grok:
      tag: grok_src_f99a3d9e
      field: src
      patterns:
        - '%{ONE}'
      pattern_definitions:
        ONE: ".5"
